name: Wring Out
description: The Pokémon literally squeezes the life out of its target, as life is fading, the squeezing will be harder.

name: Wrap
description: The Pokémon traps its foe with its body or vines, causing some damage.

name: Weather Ball
description: The user creates a ball of energy that will use the climate around it to grow in size and power.

name: Vice Grip
description: The Pokémon traps the foe with its pincers or jaws and applies pressure that will leave a nasty bruise.

name: Techno Blast
description: A laser briefly beams away from the Pokémon, whatever it hits explodes a second later. This move can be modified with the right programming of a computer.

name: Thrash
description: The Pokémon rampages and starts to attack and destroy everything on its path.

name: Tri Attack
description: The user shoots three beams. Each one is charged with a different kind of energy.

name: Trump Card
description: The more exhausted the user is, the stronger this attack will become. When the Pokémon is at the last of its strength this move can be devastating.

name: Uproar
description: The Pokémon shouts and screams and squeaks so hard the noise really hurts the ears. Nobody could get a full night of sleep with all that ruckus.

name: Take Down
description: The Pokémon recklessly grapples the foe to smash it on the ground.

name: Tail Slap
description: The Pokémon slaps the foe's face with its strong tail.

name: Tackle
description: A basic attack that consists on charging at an enemy.

name: Swift
description: The user shoots a star shaped light beam that hits the target at blinding speed.

name: Strength
description: The Pokémon strains its muscles to go beyond their own limits.

name: Stomp
description: The Pokémon steps and stomps the foe, the weight may leave the target squished on the floor.

name: Spit Up
description: After storing power, the Pokémon spits that energy at the foe. The user returns to its original size.

name: Spike Cannon
description: The Pokémon shoots a wave of pointy projectiles at the foe.

name: Skull Bash
description: The Pokémon withdraws to its shell then charges against the foe.

name: Slam
description: The user slams the foe with its tail, vines, etc. to deal a decent amount of damage.

name: Slash
description: Using parts of its body as a blade the Pokémon pierces and tears the foe with a vicious force.

name: Smelling Salts
description: The Pokémon throws some volatile salts onto the foe's face, a paralyzed Pokémon will get a strong smell.

name: Snore
description: After falling asleep the user lets out a powerful snore, disrupting any focus the foe had.

name: Self Destruct
description: The Pokémon makes use of its ability to blow up parts of its own body in an impressive display of power.

name: Secret Power
description: This move absorbs the energy around the user. It may unleash that power in unexpected ways.

name: Revelation Dance
description: The Pokémon performs a dance, the dance's engery influences the type of this move.

name: Rock Climb
description: The user climbes on top of the foe. This may be confusing for the Pokémon.

name: Round
description: The user attacks the foe with a song, if a teammate joins the song the attack will be stronger.

name: Scratch
description: The Pokémon uses its sharp claws to scratch the enemy.

name: Retaliate
description: A powerful attack. It will be even stronger if the user just suffered a great loss.

name: Relic Song
description: The user sings and dances to a melody so beautiful you won't notice you were crying while listening to it.

name: Quick Attack
description: An attack as fast as lightning.

name: Rage
description: The user gets angry and throws a tantrum at the foe. If the attacker keeps on fighting, it will make the user rage even harder.

name: Rapid Spin
description: The Pokémon spins swiftly to strike the foe, anything near will be scattered around.

name: Razor Wind
description: A sharp wind current is unleashed against anyone standing against this Pokémon.

name: Pound
description: A decent hit to smash the foes.

name: Pay Day
description: This move grants good fortune, making it more likely to get more money after each battle.

name: Multi Attack
description: A weird-looking Pokémon charges against its foes, the same attack releases different kinds of energy depending on the disk it is holding.

name: Natural Gift
description: The user throws its berry at the foe, the results can be quite surprising.

name: Nature Power
description: The Pokémon makes use of the terrain and asks nature for aid in battle.

name: Mega Punch
description: The Pokémon throws a mega potent hook towards the foe's face.

name: Mega Kick
description: The Pokémon throws a mega powered kick to the foe's face.

name: Last Resort
description: When everything else fails, the Pokémon gives everything in a last resort attack.

name: Hyper Voice
description: The user emits a horrible echoing sound that could burst the ears.

name: Hyper Fang
description: The Pokémon bites hardly into the foe with its powerful fangs.

name: Hyper Beam
description: The Pokémon casts an incredible beam that leaves a giant trail of destruction behind. The user is left exhausted.

name: Horn Attack
description: The Pokémon attacks the foe with its horns, this strike is very painful.

name: Head Charge
description: The Pokémon clashes against the foe using its head as a boulder.

name: Headbutt
description: The user strikes the foe with its hard head. Perfect for taking down fruits from trees or shake Pokémon out of their nests on treetops.

name: Giga Impact
description: The Pokémon strikes with a brutal force using all its body. The impact leaves the user somewhat stunned.

name: Fury Swipes
description: The user swiftly uses its claws to strike the foe multiple times.

name: Fury Attack
description: The Pokémon goes at it with everything its got in a rather disordered way.

name: Extreme Speed
description: The user charges at a blinding speed against the target.

name: Facade
description: The Pokémon will make an upfront attack, if the user is suffering the attack will be stronger.

name: Fake Out
description: While still preparing for battle, the user will suddenly attack the foe.

name: False Swipe
description: The user strikes the foe but lowers the power of the blow at the last second.

name: Feint
description: The Pokémon feints a strike, then hits for real even if the foe attempts to protect itself.

name: Flail
description: The user flails and struggles to survive, the more weakened it is the stronger this attack will be.

name: Explosion
description: The user focuses on exploding its body, the explosion deals a massive wave of damage. A very dangerous move.

name: Egg Bomb
description: The user throws a big egg with great force against its foe.

name: Echoed Voice
description: The user shouts loudly and the echo answers back, it will yell louder every time the echo talks back.

name: Double Edge
description: The user recklessly slams its foe to deal a lot of damage, but it may also hurt itself in the process.

name: Crush Grip
description: The Pokémon grips the foe and starts crushing it. Small targets are difficult to grasp but larger bodies will not be released until they break.

name: Cut
description: A slim but precise cut that may slice through anything.

name: Dizzy Punch
description: A swift punch to the jaw that spins the target and may leave it quite dizzy and disoriented.

name: Double Hit
description: The Pokémon uses the classic "One-Two" to attack the foe.

name: Double Slap
description: The user attacks its foe with two or more slaps in the face.

name: Crush Claw
description: The user crushes its claws against the foe, it may pierce the skin of the foe.

name: Covet
description: The user approaches with caution, deals a quick strike and takes the chance to steal the target's item.

name: Constrict
description: The Pokémon uses its body to hold and constrict the foe. It won't let go easily.

name: Bind
description: The Pokémon uses its body to bind the foe, restraining and squeezing it.

name: Body Slam
description: The user charges against the foe using its body to knock it down, leaving the target stunned.

name: Boomburst
description: The user creates an explosive sound that deafens everyone in the battlefield.

name: Chip Away
description: The user looks for an opening and strikes directly there. It nibbles bit by bit even the toughest of surfaces.

name: Comet Punch
description: The user throws a quick series of punches at the foe.

name: Barrage
description: The Pokémon throws many round objects at the target, one after the other.

name: Veevee Volley
description: Long sessions playing volley ball with your Pokémon make it very happy. During battle, it just replaces the ball with its foe.

name: Super Fang
description: The Pokémon jumps at the foe to crush it with an awful bite.

name: Sonic Boom
description: The Pokémon attacks with a small destructive shock that can go through armor, thick hide or walls to deal some damage.

name: Metronome
description: The Pokémon waves its hands with rhythm. The energy around follows the cadence and manifests with an impressive attack.

name: Return
description: If the Pokémon is treated with care and love, it will return that affection by giving all its got in battle.

name: Present
description: The user approaches its foe and gives it a lovely present that may be nice or may be a prank.

name: Me First
description: The user anticipates the next attack so it can hit the target with an astounding speed.

name: Judgment
description: Eventually, everyone gets what they deserve.

name: Horn Drill
description: The user stabs the target with a horn used like a drill, the foe is often left in a critical condition. A move to be wary of.

name: Hidden Power
description: Every Pokémon has an unknown power that can be released with surprising results.

name: Frustration
description: A move that relies on how badly a Pokémon has been treated to make it vicious and uncaring.

name: Guillotine
description: The Pokémon uses the sharpest part of its body to almost snap the neck of its foe. It is a devastating attack. The foe must be lucky to get out of it alive.

name: Endeavor
description: With pure willpower, the user struggles with its foe despite the pain.

name: Bide
description: The user endures the hit then unleashes an attack even greater.

name: Yawn
description: The user lets out an infectious yawn that will make anyone drowzy enough to fall asleep pretty soon.

name: Work Up
description: The Pokémon exercises with vigor to be physically and mentally prepared for battle.

name: Wish
description: The Pokémon makes a wish with all its might and somehow it becomes true.

name: Whirlwind
description: The Pokémon creates a powerful wind current that swirls the enemy around and sends it flying away.

name: Transform
description: The user modifies its own DNA structure to become an identical clone of any Pokémon or object it can see.

name: Tickle
description: The Pokémon tickles the foe. The laughter really disturbs the foe's fighting stance.

name: Teeter Dance
description: The user starts dancing around with woobly movements. Friends and foes will get dizzy by trying to follow it.

name: Teatime
description: The Pokémon gathers everyone for a cup of delicious tea, not eating a snack along with it would be a waste.

name: Tearful Look
description: The Pokémon's eyes start watering as if it were about to cry, its foe is moved by the tears and loses its will to fight.

name: Tail Whip
description: The Pokémon moves its tail in such a cute way that the foe will easily let its guard down.

name: Swords Dance
description: The Pokémon makes a dance that raises its battle spirit.

name: Sweet Scent
description: The Pokémon releases an aroma that its enemies will love.

name: Swallow
description: The Pokémon swallows the energy it was storing to restore some damage, it recovers its normal size afterwards.

name: Swagger
description: The Pokémon enrages the foe with its arrogant demeanor, making it lose focus in battle.

name: Supersonic
description: The Pokémon emits a series of ultrasonic waves that make the foe dizzy and disoriented.

name: Substitute
description: The Pokémon disappears in a poof of smoke. When the smoke vanishes, an object identical to the user remains in its place to shield it from harm. It looks amazingly real.

name: Stuff Cheeks
description: The Pokémon munches its berry but it keeps part of it in its cheeks. Looks adorable but it is actually a survival tactic to survive harsh winters.

name: Stockpile
description: The Pokémon swells up by storing power with its mouth, this makes the user a little more resistant to damage.

name: Spotlight
description: The user points a focused light onto one of its allies as if it were on a stage, the ally can't help but catch everyone's attention onto itself.

name: Splash
description: The user just flops splashing some water, this has no effect at all...

name: Soft Boiled
description: The user boils a freshly layed egg and restored health with the energy stored within.

name: Smokescreen
description: The user covers its foe with a cloud of smoke. Some Pokémon hide inside this screen while others use it as cover to escape.

name: Sleep Talk
description: After falling asleep, the Pokémon is still dreaming about the fight.

name: Slack Off
description: The Pokémon gets lazy and loafs around instead of fighting. This makes up for a short rest.

name: Sketch
description: The Pokémon draws its foe performing a move, it learns how to perform that move in the process.

name: Sing
description: With a charming song, the user lulls its foe to sleep.

name: Simple Beam
description: The Pokémon sends a small psychic wave to its target, giving it a simpler point of view about the world.

name: Shell Smash
description: By breaking its own shell, the user sacrifices defense in exchange of being free to fight with all its power.

name: Sharpen
description: The user cuts down the rough edges of its body to make it as sharp as a razor.

name: Screech
description: The user disrupts the fighting stance of its foe by sending a sharp sound to the foe's ears.

name: Scary Face
description: By making a frightening face, the Pokémon makes others think twice about coming near.

name: Safeguard
description: The Pokémon creates an energy shield that protects everyone from harm.

name: Roar
description: A mighty roar that scares the foe.

name: Refresh
description: The Pokémon takes a few seconds to cool down and get back in the game.

name: Reflect Type
description: The Pokémon appears to change its own physiology. This effect changes the type of the user to match another Pokémon in sight.

name: Recycle
description: One Pokémon's trash is another one's tresure.

name: Recover
description: The Pokémon's concentrates on restoring its own cells faster than anything imaginable.

name: Psych Up
description: The Pokémon's mentalizes itself stronger than anyone. They feel good. They can win. They. Can. Do. This.

name: Protect
description: The user creates an energy shield to deflect a blow. Some Pokémon may even perform an amazing parry to block the incoming attack.

name: Play Nice
description: The user starts playing with the foe in a friendly way. This makes the foe reconsider its aggressive demeanor.

name: Perish Song
description: A song of mourning and despair that resonates on the minds of anyone who listens. Makes you feel like you are on your death bed.

name: Pain Split
description: The user shares its pain with the foe. After a short while it becomes excruciating for the target.

name: Odor Sleuth
description: The Pokémon uses its keen smell to detect the foe.

name: Noble Roar
description: The Pokémon makes a roar that commands respect and authority over anyone listening.

name: Morning Sun
description: The sun shines brightly on the Pokémon and makes it feel rejuvenated like early in the morning.

name: Minimize
description: The Pokémon compacts its body, appearing smaller than its normal size.

name: Mind Reader
description: The user reads the foe's mind. It knows exactly what to do next.

name: Mimic
description: Making use of its acting talents, the Pokémon imitates what the target just did.

name: Milk Drink
description: The Pokémon drinks a glass of its own milk, the rich taste and nutrients revitalize it.

name: Mean Look
description: The Pokémon gives a menacing look that freezes the foe on the spot with intense fear.

name: Lucky Chant
description: The user chants an incantation to the skies, the beautiful performance grants this Pokémon and its allies divine protection.

name: Lovely Kiss
description: The Pokémon approaches the foe with a skiss. Its ugly face and awful smooch make the poor creature faint in terror.

name: Lock-On
description: The Pokémon's eyes zoom at a moving target to ensure that the next attack will be dealt with precision.

name: Leer
description: A vicious glare that will make any opponent doubt its own strength in battle.

name: Laser Focus
description: Through its incredible awareness the Pokémon finds a straight path into a weak point of the foe. The attack that follows is usually devastating.

name: Howl
description: The Pokémon let's out an impressive howl, making it appear a lot more menacing.

name: Helping Hand
description: The Pokémon assists an ally. Together they are stronger.

name: Heal Bell
description: The Pokémon chimes a magical bell, legend says the soothing sound has healing properties.

name: Harden
description: The user stiffens its body and prepares for any incoming attack.

name: Growth
description: The Pokémon expands its body, it grows bigger and stronger.

name: Growl
description: Either by a mancing attitude or cute demeanor, the foe will be unsure about attacking the user with full force.

name: Glare
description: The Pokémon uses its intimidating glare to paralyze the foe with sheer terror.

name: Foresight
description: The Pokémon uses its developed senses and mental ability to foresee the immediate future.

name: Follow Me
description: The Pokémon will draw everyone's attention. All foes are taunted to do their worst.

name: Focus Energy
description: The Pokémon's energy is raised to make all strikes much more precise.

name: Flash
description: The user suddenly emits a blinding light around its body, dazing its opponent in the process.

name: Entrainment
description: The Pokémon dances with a catchy rhythm. The target starts dancing too and both connect to a very personal level through this performance.

name: Endure
description: The user gets prepared to receive a fatal blow. It resists the pain despite being seriously hurt.

name: Encore
description: The user claps and cheers at the target to encourage it to repeat what it just did.

name: Double Team
description: The user moves rapidly around the foe, creating illusory copies of itself.

name: Disable
description: The user hits a nerve on the foe, impeding it from performing its previous action for a short while.

name: Defense Curl
description: The user curls like a ball to protect against most threats.

name: Court Change
description: The Pokémon signals the referee for half-time, the referee complies and both parties swap their sides of the field. Wait. Did we forget something?

name: Copycat
description: The user will closely watch the movements of the target and will imitate them to perfection.

name: Conversion 2
description: The Pokémon downloads the data of a move that was used against it. Change the code of the user to a type resistant to that move.

name: Conversion
description: The Pokémon downloads the data of a move to add it to its code.

name: Confide
description: The Pokémon tells a secret to the target. The foe loses its ability to concentrate.

name: Captivate
description: The Pokémon shows off its attractiveness and even flirts with the opponents, those who fall for its charms can't focus on the battle.

name: Camouflage
description: The user mimics the environment, it becomes one with the surroundings.

name: Block
description: The user moves swiftly, blocking the escape routes of the foe.

name: Bestow
description: The Pokémon respectfully offers an item, the target will take it and keep it to be polite.

name: Belly Drum
description: The Pokémon roars a war cry while hitting its belly.

name: Baton Pass
description: The user stores part of its power on a twig or a stick, anyone who touches the item will recieve its might.

name: Attract
description: The user makes use of its good looks and attitude to infatuate its foe.

name: Assist
description: The Pokémon hurriedly remembers one action performed by a partner. Some Pokémon can even do what a human does and assist him with any tasks.

name: After You
description: The user bows and courteously lets an ally or foe use their action first.

name: Accupressure
description: The user starts pushing its pressure points, releasing the energy that was stored in its body.

name: Wake-up Slap
description: A powerful slap that makes even the laziest Pokémon be well awake.

name: Vital Throw
description: The Pokémon awaits for the perfect moment to strike the foe.

name: Vacuum Wave
description: The user pulls the enemy closer using the power of its ki. This traction has a lot of strength and may break anything it pulls.

name: Triple Kick
description: The user throws three or more kicks, leaving the harder blow for the end.

name: Superpower
description: The Pokémon makes use of all its force to deliver a crushing strike to the foe, this demands a lot from the user.

name: Submission
description: The user recklessly struggles with the foe to pin it to the ground.

name: Storm Throw
description: The user impacts a weak spot with a powerful blow.

name: Sky Uppercut
description: The user attacks with an uppercut, throwing the foe skyward with lots of force.

name: Quick Guard
description: The user reacts instinctively and defends itself and its teammates, nullifying the effects of the fastest attacks.

name: Revenge
description: The Pokémon fights ruthlessly and may retaliate fiercely against a foe that has hurt the user.

name: Reversal
description: The user gathers its mettle to block away the pain and focus only on hitting harder.

name: Rock Smash
description: A powerful hit that can crush rocks. Used against a foe it is sure to leave an awful bruise and a crack on its armor.

name: Rolling Kick
description: The user spins in the air landing an impressive kick that may daze the target.

name: Sacred Sword
description: The user slashes its target with a mighty blade that no armor can stop.

name: Secret Sword
description: An invisible wave cuts through the target, you can feel its sharp edge but you cannot see it.

name: Seismic Toss
description: The target gets launched up then falls face first into the ground, the stronger the user the higher the foe will be thrown.

name: Power-up Punch
description: The Pokémon uses this punch to test the surface of an object. The user toughens up to deal better blows.

name: Octolock
description: The user wraps its tenctacles to immobilize the foe. Being so close enables the user to find weak spots.

name: No Retreat
description: No surrender. No retreat. Until victory always.

name: Meteor Assault
description: The Pokémon will make an incredible jump to the sky, then lunge towards the foe at a staggering speed, crashing the ground upon impact. The user is left very tired.

name: Mat Block
description: The Pokémon uses a mat or something similar as a shield.

name: Mach Punch
description: The user launches a punch so quickly that it's barely seen.

name: Low Sweep
description: The Pokémon strikes the foe's legs, leaving it unable to walk normally or run.

name: Low Kick
description: The user kicks the target making it fall, the bigger the foe the harder the fall.

name: Flying Press
description: The user flies towards the foe from the sky in pure Lucha Libre style.

name: Focus Blast
description: The user concentrates and releases a blast of energy.

name: Focus Punch
description: A brutal punch that requires calm and concentration.

name: Force Palm
description: A powerful open palm hit that knocks the foe away and may leave him unable to move.

name: Hammer Arm
description: A mighty arm thrust that leaves the user quite tired.

name: High Jump Kick
description: The user launches itself up and falls down with a brutal kick. It might hurt the user if it doesn't hit the target.

name: Jump Kick
description: The Pokémon jumps and delivers a powerful kick. It might hurt the user if it doesn't hit the target.

name: Karate Chop
description: A basic fighting chop that has been practiced and mastered.

name: Final Gambit
description: The Pokémon uses its last strength into an all-or-nothing attack, after that, it faints.

name: Dynamic Punch
description: A punch that hits a small pressure point. It leaves the foe disoriented.

name: Drain Punch
description: The Pokémon strikes with a powerful punch. Through contact, it absorbs some vital energy.

name: Double Kick
description: The user throws two powerful kicks.

name: Detect
description: The user detects the intentions of the attacker and acts out to minimize the damage.

name: Cross Chop
description: The user delivers a chop with its arms crossed trying to hit a weak spot.

name: Counter
description: The user prepares to receive damage, then returns that same damage and more.

name: Close Combat
description: The user attacks at a close distance to deal lots of damage. The foe is also close enough to attack.

name: Arm Thrust
description: The user quickly throws blows of open-palmed thrusts against the foe.

name: Aura Sphere
description: The user channels its aura and launches this power in the form of a sphere. The foe's aura is hit, leaving the target unscratched but deeply hurt.

name: Body Press
description: The Pokémon makes a judo maneuver, using its body mass instead of its strength against the target.

name: Brick Break
description: The Pokémon uses its palm or claws to perform a one-armed chop that shatters even invisible barriers.

name: Bulk Up
description: The Pokémon shows its muscles with intimidating poses to look bigger and stronger.

name: Circle Throw
description: The user throws the target 60 feet out the battlefield.

name: Bite
description: The user lands a vicious bite that may leave an ugly bruise.

name: String Shot
description: The user shoots a silk string that ties and limits the movement of its foe.

name: But Bite
description: The Pokémon nibbles its foe, if it finds anything tasty it will eat it in an instant. It may try to eat almost anything.

name: Vine Whip
description: The Pokémon lashes vines to strike the foe.

name: Trop Kick
description: The user strikes with an intense and alluring kick.

name: Leech Seed
description: The user plants some seeds on the target, the seeds sprout and restore the user's health by absorbing the foe's vital energy.

name: Bone Club
description: The user hits the target with a bone, the smack may leave a bump on the target's head.

name: Wood Hammer
description: The Pokémon recklessly slams the foe with a part of its rugged body, the user also gets hurt in the process.

name: Spark
description: The user tackles the foe, releasing a powerful spark on contact.

name: Poison Powder
description: The user scatters a small cloud of venemous dust that immediately causes coughing and fever.

name: Sleep Powder
description: The user scatters powder around, anyone who comes in contact with it will fall asleep.

name: Razor Leaf
description: The Pokémon recklessly grapples the foe to smash it on the ground.

name: Sweet Scent
description: The Pokémon releases an aroma that its enemies will love.

name: Worry Seed
description: The user plants a seed in its foe. It causes a restless preoccupation that won't let it sleep at night.

name: Synthesis
description: The Pokémon uses the sunlight as energy to regain its vitality.

name: Solar Beam
description: The user focuses the sunlight it has absorbed into a powerful and devastating beam of light.

name: Grassy Terrain
description: The Pokémon calls upon the healing power of nature to grow a patch of miraculous grass on its side of the battlefield.

name: Amnesia
description: As a fine example of mind over matter, the user temporarily empties its mind to make it more resilient.

name: Grass Pledge
description: The Pokémon chants to invoke the power of Grass. Its pledge is heard then the soil trembles and the ground crumbles as vegetation rises to grapple anyone in the field.

name: Petal Dance
description: The Pokémon starts swirling petals around in a true display of nature's power, the petals are guided by the wind to strike the foe.

name: Petal Blizzard
description: The Pokémon showers the battlefield with a raging blizzard of petals and leaves, anyone close to the user will suffer the consequences.

name: Outrage
description: The user awakens their primal instinct as a dragon and unleashes its uncontrollable fury, destroying everything in its path. After that, the Pokémon is left disoriented and confused.

name: Hydro Cannon
description: The Pokémon blasts the foe with a water surge that could bring down a house. The user needs to rest afterwards.

name: Curse
description: The Pokémon prepares to deal and receive damage by muttering something not appropriate for kids.

name: Thunder Shock
description: A small electric attack that shocks the foe and may leave it with muscular cramps. Some electric devices hit by this attack will malfunction.

name: Volt Tackle
description: The user surrounds itself with big bolts of electricity, then it crashes against the foe.

name: Discharge
description: The user releases its stored electricity in all directions.

name: Fake Out
description: While still preparing for battle, the user will suddenly attack the foe.

name: Thunderbolt
description: A strong electric attack that shocks and harms the foe. It can destroy most kinds of electric equipment.

name: Thunder
description: The Pokémon commands a tremendous lightning to strike a specific point on the ground. It's quite dangerous.

name: Wild Charge
description: The Pokémon surrounds itself with wild bolts of lightning, then tackles recklessly.

name: Thunder Wave
description: A tide of bright lightning streams from the floor onto the foe. The target's body will be cramped for hours.

name: Light Screen
description: The user manifests its mental power on the world, creating walls and floors of light that help prevent the passing of energies.

name: Electro Ball
description: The Pokémon creates a small electricity orb that is hurled at the target. If the user is faster, the impact will be bigger.

name: Nuzzle
description: The Pokémon rubs its electrified cheeks against the foe, it looks very cute but it can be dangerous.

name: Frenzy Plant
description: User roots down and calls the plants to grow in a frenzy around the foe, though it leaves the user exhausted.

name: Ember
description: The user shoots a small flame against the target that may cause a first-degree burn.

name: Dragon Rage
description: A dual colored flame that always leaves the same burn marks on everything it touches.

name: Fire Fang
description: The user breathes fire from its mouth while biting the target.

name: Flame Burst
description: A concentrated flameball that bursts on contact with the foe, scattering smaller flames around.

name: Fire Spin
description: The user creates a vortex of fire that remains spinning in the battlefield, trapping the foe within.

name: Flamethrower
description: The user lets out a powerful fire stream that leaves a scorched trail.

name: Inferno
description: The Pokémon sets the foe on fire. These flames rise up to 6 feet. A very dangerous move.

name: Metal Claw
description: The Pokémon attacks using its sharp claws, the friction may leave them even sharper.

name: Dragon Dance
description: The user performs a vigourous dance that boosts the fighting spirit and reflexes.

name: Fire Pledge
description: The Pokémon chants to invoke the power of fire. Its pledge is heard, then the flames consume everything around.

name: Air Slash
description: The user will surround the foe with razor-like wind that may knock it down.

name: Wing Attack
description: The user flies towards the foe and strikes with its wings.

name: Dragon Claw
description: The Pokémon uses its strong claws to deliver a fierce tearing blow.

name: Shadow Claw
description: Claws become semi-ethereal and are able to briefly pierce armor, hide, skin and objects so it can strike the target on any weak spot.

name: Flare Blitz
description: The user sets itself on fire, recklessly charging against the target with a brutal strike.

name: Heat Wave
description: The user breathes a giant wave of incansescent air that might set fire to whatever it touches.

name: Water Gun
description: The user learns to shoot water with enough force to hurt the foe.

name: Bubble
description: A spray of bubbles flies around the enemies, some of the bubbles stick to their bodies hindering their movement.

name: Water Pulse
description: The Pokémon attacks with a pulsing blast of water, this leaves the foe feeling dizzy.

name: Aqua Tail
description: The user swings its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

name: Agility
description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster.

name: Withdraw
description: The user hides inside its hard shell to protect itself from incoming attacks.

name: Iron Defense
description: The Pokémon hardens its body surface as if it was made from the strongest iron around.

name: Rain Dance
description: The user performs a curious mystic dance that summons a heavy rainfall.

name: Hydro Pump
description: The user builds up pressure inside its body and then releases a tremendous amount of water at the target.

name: Surf
description: A giant wave of water sweeps the area while the user swims on top of it.

name: Aqua Jet
description: The user propels itself with a blast of water and strikes at high speed.

name: Water Pledge
description: The Pokémon chants to invoke the power of water. Moisture in the air bends the light to create an inspiring rainbow. Everyone in the field is sure to give its best.

name: Icy Wind
description: A breeze so cold that it chills you to the bone, making it harder to move.

name: Mud Sport
description: The user covers everything with mud, reducing the effectiveness of electric attacks made on the field.

name: Flash Cannon
description: The user covers everything with mud, reducing the effectiveness of electric attacks made on the field.

name: Zap Cannon
description: The user hurls a dreadful bombardment of electric explosions. Anyone hit won't be able to move for a very long time.
